GSD.product_version: versions from v4.18 to before v5.4.198
GSD.description:
drm/msm/mdp5: Return error code in mdp5_mixer_release when deadlock is detected

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.4.198 by commit 22d8424913b1348c6324916745fadaeea5273f0e, it was introduced in version v4.18 by commit 7907a0d77cb461f58045763c205a5830be72e97c. For more details please see the references link.
